PitchName.h

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /**********************************************************************
00002 
00003   Audacity: A Digital Audio Editor
00004 
00005   PitchName.h
00006 
00007   Copyright 2005-9, Vaughan Johnson and Dominic Mazzoni. 
00008   All rights reserved.
00009 
00010   Utilities for converting from frequency to pitch 
00011   and from pitch to absolute (e.g., C4 for middle C) 
00012   or nominal (A through G#) pitch name.
00013 
00014 **********************************************************************/
00015 
00016 #ifndef __AUDACITY_PITCHNAME__
00017 #define __AUDACITY_PITCHNAME__
00018 
00019 #include <wx/defs.h>
00020 
00021 // FreqToMIDInoteNumber takes a frequency in Hz (exponential scale relative to 
00022 // alphabetic pitch names) and returns a pitch ID number (linear 
00023 // scale), such that A440 (A4) is 69, middle C (C4) is 60, etc.
00024 // Each register starts with C (e.g., for middle C and A440, 
00025 // it's register 4).
00026 double FreqToMIDInoteNumber(double freq);
00027 
00028 // PitchIndex returns the [0,11] index for a double pitchNum, 
00029 // as per result from FreqToMIDInoteNumber, corresponding to modulo 12 
00030 // of the integer part of (pitchNum + 0.5), so 0=C, 1=C#, etc.
00031 unsigned int PitchIndex(double pitchNum);
00032 
00033 // PitchName takes pitchNum (as per result from 
00034 // FreqToMIDInoteNumber) and returns a standard pitch/note name [C, C#, etc.). 
00035 // Sharps are the default, unless, bWantFlats is true.
00036 wxChar * PitchName(double pitchNum, bool bWantFlats = false);
00037 
00038 // PitchName_Absolute does the same thing as PitchName, but appends 
00039 // the register number, e.g., instead of "C" it will return "C4" 
00040 // if the pitchNum corresonds to middle C.
00041 // Sharps are the default, unless, bWantFlats is true.
00042 wxChar * PitchName_Absolute(double pitchNum, bool bWantFlats = false);
00043 
00044 #endif   // __AUDACITY_PITCHNAME__
00045

00047 // version control system. Please do not modify past this point.

00051 // indent-tabs-mode: nil
00052 // End:
